statements: SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data ORDER BY site_id ASC, date DESC, energy_usage ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT site_id, date, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE site_id = 1 ORDER BY date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT date, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT AVG(energy_usage) AS avg_energy_usage FROM energy_consumption_data
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data ORDER BY energy_usage DESC, date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE site_id = 1 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT site_id, SUM(energy_usage) AS total_energy_usage FROM energy_consumption_data GROUP BY site_id
SELECT AVG(energy_usage) AS average_energy_usage FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT MAX(energy_usage) AS max_energy_usage, MIN(energy_usage) AS min_energy_usage FROM energy_consumption_data
SELECT site_id, COUNT(*) AS records_count FROM energy_consumption_data GROUP BY site_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 10
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE energy_consumed > 1000;
SELECT site_id, energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE site_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM site_resources WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT site_id, capacity FROM site_resources WHERE voltage >= 220;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT site_id, timestamp, energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE energy_consumed > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM site_resources WHERE capacity >= 500 ORDER BY site_id ASC;
SELECT site_id, location, sum(capacity) AS total_capacity FROM site_resources GROUP BY site_id, location HAVING total_capacity > 2000;
SELECT e.site_id, e.energy_consumed, r.location FROM energy_consumption_data e JOIN site_resources r ON e.site_id = r.site_id WHERE e.energy_consumed < 50 AND r.voltage > 220;
SELECT MAX(energy_consumed), MIN(energy_consumed), AVG(energy_consumed) FROM energy_consumption_data;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data;
SELECT site_id, date, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT site_name, location FROM site_information WHERE region = 'East';
SELECT * FROM resource_optimization WHERE optimization_category = 'Cost';
SELECT DISTINCT region FROM site_information;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE site_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT site_id, date, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT site_id, site_name, location FROM site_information WHERE region = 'East';
SELECT * FROM resource_optimization WHERE optimization_category = 'Energy Efficiency' AND date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT site_id, COUNT(optimization_id) AS total_optimizations FROM resource_optimization GROUP BY site_id HAVING total_optimizations > 5;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT site_id, energy_value FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE site_id = 3
SELECT site_id, timestamp, energy_value FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT site_id, MAX(energy_value) AS max_energy_value FROM EnergyConsumptionData GROUP BY site_id
SELECT * FROM SiteInformation WHERE location='New York'
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT site_id, energy_value FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE energy_value > 100 ORDER BY site_id ASC
SELECT site_id, site_name, location FROM SiteInformation WHERE owner = 'ABC Corp'
SELECT site_id, timestamp, resource_type, resource_value FROM ResourceUsage WHERE site_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT site_id, optimization_metric, optimization_value FROM OptimizationResults WHERE optimization_value < 0.5 ORDER BY site_id
SELECT * FROM site;
SELECT site_name, location FROM site;
SELECT * FROM energy_meter WHERE installation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT meter_id, meter_type FROM energy_meter ORDER BY meter_type DESC;
SELECT reading_id, energy_value FROM energy_reading WHERE reading_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM site;
SELECT site_id, site_name FROM site ORDER BY site_name DESC;
SELECT meter_id, meter_type, installation_date FROM energy_meter WHERE installation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY installation_date ASC;
SELECT reading_id, energy_value FROM energy_reading WHERE energy_value > 1000 ORDER BY reading_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_date, optimization_strategy FROM energy_analysis WHERE optimization_strategy LIKE '%efficiency%' ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
